oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chattanooga
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: View of Chattanooga, Tennessee during the Civil War. Shows military encampments, including tents.
Chattanooga experienced several battles in November of 1863 before federal forces won in late November.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Chattanooga, Battle of, Chattanooga, Tenn., 1863; Chattanooga (Tenn.); Confederate States of America--History; United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865
Cities & towns; Military encampments
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: United States. Army. Corps of Engineers.
